subtitles.text: Morning Musume。' It's 14!
Morning Musume。ヌs 73rd new single will be released on October 25th .
The title of the song is "Sukkoku Fever! Bake Up Call! Mezame Toki! And Devining Shine! The single will be a triple A-side single with three songs.
Yes, "Sukkoku Fever! The first song, "SUTSUGOKU FEVER!", was a surprise to the members as well as to the male audience who laughed,
Yoshiko-sensei choreographed the chorus of the song, and it is her wish that everyone will dance to the chorus,
I hope everyone will join in and dance the choreography "Sukkousoku Fever! I would be very happy if everyone could do the choreography "SUTSUKODO FEVER!
The second song, "Bake Up Call! Mezameru toki! is a song in which the voices of the 14 members are expressed in a very unique way,
The voices of the 17th term members, who are participating in this single for the first time, are of course also very good,
It's great, isn't it?
It's great, isn't it? The single has been performed 5 or 7 times as a great individuality,
The lyrics are interesting because they are a play on words from previous singles.
I hope you will enjoy listening to it.
The third song, "Never Ending Shine!
We sang most of the songs together,
But we are all singing together, and we are all doing the same formation,
The lyrics of all the members' parts are "What is this love? I think it's very beautiful.
I think it's very beautiful,
I think the overall worldview of the song is one of deep love,
While recording the song, I was thinking about the feelings of Morning Musume。 I was able to sing the song while thinking about the feelings of the fans,
I was able to sing the song while thinking about the feelings of Morning Musume,
I would be happy if you could listen to it.
This single is my last single as I am graduating.
The fact that the debut single of the 17th term and my last single were released together gives me a great sense of certainty,
I think it will be a wonderful single that will remain in your memories for a long time to come.
Please listen to it a lot.
Please listen to it a lot.
Please look forward to the new single!
Enjoy!
That's all for Morning Musume。 23.
Rio Kitagawa of Morning Musume。 13 with Rio Kitagawa,Morning Musume。' 13, and Rio Kitagawa,
I am Kaon Ishiguri from Ocha-no-Ma.
We will be presenting this time together, so please bear with us until the end.
Last month, I, Rio Kitagawa, released my fourth photo book, "Refreshing Season.
This is the fourth consecutive year that I have released a photo book,
I have always photographed the theme of summer in Okinawa, or rather, the scenery there,
But this time, they granted my wish and we were able to shoot in the snow in winter.
I had only told them that I wanted to shoot in the snow,
In fact, we were able to pack three seasons into one book: snow, spring cherry blossoms, and summer,
As you flip through the pages of the book, you can really feel the change of the seasons,
That is the main point of the book.
And Morning Musume。 13 has started their fall tour.
At the time of this recording, the tour has not started yet,
This is the first tour for the 17th term and the last tour for Ms. Fukumura,
The setlist included songs that I remember and songs that I had fond memories of,

The setlist includes some memorable songs and some nostalgic songs, and the freshness of the 17th term members and the fact that Ms. Fukumura is getting angry with the members makes this tour very attractive,
If you are in the area, please come and see us.
Please come and visit us if you are in the area.

This is the first live house tour for Ochanoma,
This tour will take us to all 47 prefectures in Japan,
This will be the first time for Ochanoma to visit some of the 47 prefectures in Japan,
We hope you are looking forward to it.

Morning Musume。 23's Rio Kitagawa and Kanami Ishiguri of Ochanoma present "Halo! Ste. 23 and Kanami Ishiguri of Ochanoma.

Mr. Ishiguri, who is a certified tea advisor, what kind of tea do you recommend for this season?
It's a tea made with chestnuts in the fall.
This year, Ochanoma is performing at a faster pace than last year!

How to use time.

The air is delicious and energizing, so please come!
Project celebrates its 25th anniversary this year!

Chestnut tea?

I am very happy to know about it!

I'd like to hear more about Hokkaido, where you're from.

The first thing I think about Hokkaido is
I think the first thing people think about Hokkaido is that the air is delicious.
It's really delicious.

It's wonderful!
It is a land of courage and hope.

I would like to go there a lot.

I went there for the first time to try vegetable curry, and it was really delicious,
But there are many kinds of curry,

There are many kinds of curries,

I would like to explore more curry dishes in the future.
That's great.

Yes, so, first of all, do you have any lyrics that touched your heart?

This is a song that Ochanoma covered during the spring tour.

The lyrics "Be the turtle that can laugh at the end" are my favorite.
I was a trainee for a long time, and these lyrics saved my life many times.
I love it very much.

I love the lyrics of the speech of the sex cat, "You're just busy being inefficient, and you feel like you've done your best without getting any results.
The lyrics are quite harsh, which you can't imagine from the title.
But I really feel that the lyrics are very true.But I really think that's exactly how it is.
I'm the type of person who does things in a hurry at the last minute.
I understand.
I always say that I'm too busy, too busy.
But my colleague Mei Yamazaki is the type of girl who starts preparing for the event a month or so in advance.
That's why, when it comes to this same time of the year...
There's just too much difference in the way we have our hearts and minds set at the same time.
I felt that I shouldn't say "I'm busy, I'm busy, I'm busy" when I'm really just doing it inefficiently.
Oh...

I was really encouraged,
I was encouraged by the lyrics, and there was a link between the lyrics and myself,

I understand it very well.

Morning Musume。' 23's Rio Kitagawa and
Rio Kitagawa of Morning Musume'23 and Kanami Ishigiri of Ochanoma will be presenting "Halo! STE, presented by Rio Kitagawa of Morning Musume。
Morning Musume。 23 started last weekend.
Ochanoma will start their fall tour on October 7.
I have written my resolutions for the fall tour in my sketchbook, and I would like to express them here.
Let me start with me, Rio Kitagawa.
I am also a growth.
As I mentioned earlier, this is the first tour for the 17th term and the last tour for Ms. Fukumura,
I think this is a place where the 17th term members can grow a lot,
I also think that Rio Sakurai, a member of the 16th term, who is participating in the tour as a senior for the first time, will also grow a lot,
I am sure that Rio Sakurai, a 16th term member who will be joining the tour as a senior for the first time, will also grow up a lot,
I think I can learn a lot from them and also from Ms. Fukumura, who will be joining us for the last time,
I would like to do my best so that I can grow up as well.
Next, here is Kanon Ishiguri's resolution.
I am going to conquer the whole country.
As I mentioned earlier, Ochanoma's fall tour will take us to all 47 prefectures of Japan,
As I mentioned earlier, our fall tour is a live house tour that will take us to all 47 prefectures of Japan,
This is a tour where Ochanoma will visit you all over Japan,
We will do our best to deliver Ochanoma to everyone's Ochanoma,
I will do my best to bring Ochanoma to all of you and to conquer the whole country.
That's so wonderful.
Thank you very much.
We have talked with each other about a lot of things,
Are there any other things you are personally looking forward to?
I am.
I am looking forward to seeing the souvenirs from each of the 47 prefectures we will visit,
I am usually not the type to buy many souvenirs when I go on an expedition,
I am not the type of person who usually buys souvenirs when I go on an expedition, but this time I am determined to buy 47 pieces of souvenirs,
I'm going to enjoy myself so much.I am going to enjoy it all.
It is also Mr. Fukumura's last tour,
I want to make a lot of memories of the two of us,
When I get busy with performances, I tend not to have time to take pictures,
But I really want to make time to take lots of pictures, even if I have to force myself to do so,
For example, we may have eaten a delicious meal together, or talked a lot backstage together,
I would like to make a lot of memories, even if they are small ones.
